definition: To provide instruction and guidance to someone, typically in a structured manner, with the aim of developing their skills, knowledge, or abilities in a specific field or profession. This term is commonly used in the context of education, vocational training, or professional development.

examples.german: Ich möchte mich zur Krankenschwester ausbilden lassen.
examples.english: I want to train as a nurse.

examples.german: Er lässt sich zum Elektriker ausbilden.
examples.english: He is training to become an electrician.

examples.german: Sie hat sich als Lehrerin ausbilden lassen.
Die Firma bildet jedes Jahr neue Azubis aus.
examples.english: The company trains new apprentices every year.

examples.german: Mein Vater hat mich in seinem Beruf ausgebildet.
examples.english: My father trained me in his profession.
